text: Hakkı Atun (born 7 October 1935Profile of Hakkı Atun) is a Turkish Cypriot politician. He was the Prime Minister Northern Cyprus from 1994 to 1996. He was born in Famagusta in 1935. He was the Speaker of the Assembly from 1985 to 1993 and again from 1996 to 1998. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish politicians Category:Speakers of the Assembly of Northern Cyprus Category:Prime Ministers of Northern Cyprus
title: Hakkı Atun
